程序包 representation

类 InnerNode

java.lang.Object
representation.Node
representation.InnerNode
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable, Event
直接已知子类:
BattleNode, ChanceNode, DecisionNode
public class InnerNode extends Node
Represents an inner node within the game's narrative structure. An inner node typically has multiple paths leading to various subsequent nodes, representing the choices or branches in the story. It's designed to dynamically manage the collection of next possible nodes using an ArrayList, allowing for runtime modifications to the narrative flow.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • InnerNode

      public InnerNode(String description)
      Constructs an InnerNode with a specified description. Initializes the node with an empty list of next nodes, ready to be populated.
      参数:
      description - The narrative description of this node.

  • 方法详细资料

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the description of the node to the console.
      指定者:
      display 在接口中 Event
      指定者:
      display 在类中 Node

    • chooseNext

      public Node chooseNext()
      Chooses and returns the next node to proceed to based on the current node's logic. This base implementation simply returns the first node from the list of next nodes. Override this method to implement custom navigation logic.
      指定者:
      chooseNext 在接口中 Event
      指定者:
      chooseNext 在类中 Node
      返回:
      The next Node in the sequence, or null if there are no next nodes.

    • addNextNode

      public void addNextNode(Node node)
      Dynamically adds a node to the list of next possible nodes.
      参数:
      node - The Node to add.

    • removeNextNode

      public void removeNextNode(int index)
      Removes a node at a specific index from the list of next possible nodes.
      参数:
      index - The index of the node to remove.

    • getNextNodes

      public List<Node> getNextNodes()
      Retrieves all the next possible nodes as an unmodifiable list.
      返回:
      An unmodifiable view of the list of next nodes.

    • setNextNodes

      public void setNextNodes(List<Node> newNextNodes)
      Replaces the current list of next nodes with a new list provided. This allows for bulk updates to the narrative structure.
      参数:
      newNextNodes - The new list of next nodes to set.

    • getNextNode

      public Node getNextNode(int i)
      Retrieves a specific next node given an index. Returns null if the index is out of bounds.
      参数:
      i - The index of the node to retrieve.
      返回:
      The Node at the specified index or null if index is out of bounds.
